para.text: If Singular Value Decomposition is to be used with PEST, you can use "superparameters" to reduce the PEST execution time. You can select

dialog box. With this option, ModelMuse will create a PEST Control File, and then use the SUPCALC PEST utility program to modify the PEST Control file. After running SUPCALC with the modified PEST file, it will restore the backed-up PEST control file. SUPCALC will display the minimum number of super-parameters to use with the model.

If the option to run PEST is selected, ModelMuse will back up the existing PEST control file and export a new one suitable for use with SUPCALC. Then ModelMuse will create a batch file named RunSupCalc.bat. The batch file will first run PEST if that option is selected and then restore the backed-up PEST control file. It will then add a command to run SUPCALC. If the option to run SUPCALC is selected, ModelMuse will start the RunSupCalc.bat batch file. SUPCALC will display the minimum number of super-parameters for the model.
File|Export|PEST|Modify PEST Control File with SVDAPREP
dialog box. This dialog box will allow you to
generate a PEST control file suitable for use with Singular Value Decomposition by running the SVDAPREP PEST utility program and then run PEST with the modified PEST control file.
